016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.domainevents.publisher;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.concurrent.CloseableSemaphore;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.InstanceConfiguration;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.domainevents.api.DomainEvents;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.domainevents.helpers.context.DomainEventMetadata;
023import com.exoreaction.xorcery.metadata.DeploymentMetadata;
024import com.exoreaction.xorcery.metadata.Metadata;
025import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.WithMetadata;
026import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.WithResult;
027import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.client.ClientConfiguration;
028import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.client.ReactiveStreamsClient;
029import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.util.SubscriberConfiguration;
030import jakarta.inject.Inject;
031import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
032import org.glassfish.hk2.api.PreDestroy;
033import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.ContractsProvided;
034import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
035import org.reactivestreams.Publisher;
036import org.reactivestreams.Subscriber;
037import org.reactivestreams.Subscription;
038
039import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
040import java.util.concurrent.CompletionException;
041import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
042
043@Service(name = "domainevents")
044@ContractsProvided({DomainEventPublisher.class, PreDestroy.class})
045public class DomainEventsService
046        implements DomainEventPublisher,
047        Publisher<WithResult<WithMetadata<DomainEvents>, Metadata>>,
048        PreDestroy {
049
050    private final DeploymentMetadata deploymentMetadata;
051
052    private Subscriber<? super WithResult<WithMetadata<DomainEvents>, Metadata>> subscriber;
053
054    private final CloseableSemaphore requests = new CloseableSemaphore(0);
055
056    @Inject
057    public DomainEventsService(ReactiveStreamsClient reactiveStreams,
058                               Configuration configuration) {
059
060        this.deploymentMetadata = new DomainEventMetadata.Builder(new Metadata.Builder())
061                .configuration(configuration)
062                .build();
063        DomainEventsConfiguration domainEventsConfiguration = new DomainEventsConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("domainevents"));
064        SubscriberConfiguration subscriberConfiguration = domainEventsConfiguration.getSubscriberConfiguration();
065        reactiveStreams.publish(subscriberConfiguration.getUri().orElse(null), subscriberConfiguration.getStream(),
066                        subscriberConfiguration::getConfiguration,
067                        this, DomainEventsService.class, new ClientConfiguration(domainEventsConfiguration.getPublisherConfiguration()))
068                .exceptionally(t ->
069                {
070                    if (t instanceof CompletionException)
071                        LogManager.getLogger(getClass()).error("Domain event publisher failed", t);
072                    return null;
073                });
074    }
075
076    @Override
077    public void preDestroy() {
078        requests.close();
079        subscriber.onComplete();
080    }
081
082    @Override
083    public void subscribe(Subscriber<? super WithResult<WithMetadata<DomainEvents>, Metadata>> subscriber) {
084        this.subscriber = subscriber;
085        subscriber.onSubscribe(new Subscription() {
086            @Override
087            public void request(long n) {
088                requests.release((int) n);
089            }
090
091            @Override
092            public void cancel() {
093                LogManager.getLogger(getClass()).warn("Domain event publisher cancelled");
094            }
095        });
096    }
097
098    public CompletableFuture<Metadata> publish(Metadata metadata, DomainEvents events) {
099        try {
100            requests.tryAcquire(10, TimeUnit.SECONDS);
101            CompletableFuture<Metadata> future = new CompletableFuture<>();
102            subscriber.onNext(new WithResult<>(new WithMetadata<>(metadata.toBuilder().add(deploymentMetadata.context()).build(), events), future));
103            return future;
104        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
105            return CompletableFuture.failedFuture(e);
106        }
107    }
108}
